txt.en: 'I see that they were quite honoured to receive such tokens of friendship! My decree that my people should demonstrate extra kindness is already seeing results. Now more dwarves than ever will rally to our cause and work to reclaim Gundabad!'
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nPrince Ingór wishes to talk to you.
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nPrince Ingór wishes to talk to you.
Lieutenant of Gorgar

'[placeholder], I have given it some thought. While the Zhélruka are a very kind people, I believe there are some who might think us... impolite! Can you believe it?

'That is why I have decided that all Zhélruka in Gundabad must make every effort to do good deeds and be kind to the rest of the dwarves here, no matter how bothersome they may be!

'To that end, I want you to assist with making and presenting a great gift to the Longbeards. I have decided a gift of elegant Zhélruka blades will be just the thing. Gather some ingots and assist at the forge. A number of Longbeard captains are set to visit Vérnozal soon, and this gift will demonstrate our generosity.'
The monster commander in this mission will attempt a brutal wounding attack.
You have pledged to lend your aid and your adventuring skills to the Zhélruka and to fight on their behalf in Gundabad.
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nYou should collect some ingots at the upper forges in Vérnozal.
Forge Zhélruka weapons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Prince Ingór
Forged Zhélruka weapons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Gather some ingots and assist at the forge. The Longbeard captains are set to visit Vérnozal soon.'
Talk to Prince Ingór
Collect ingots near the upper forges ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gave Zhélruka weapons to visiting Longbeard captains ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nYou should forge some Zhélruka weapons in Vérnozal.

'Every weapon is perfect? Good, good! The Longbeard captains arrived while you were away. I have kept them busy with a tour of Vérnozal.\n\n'Now go, and present them with the exquisite blades of the Zhélruka.'

'These blades are of an excellent make. They have not been battle-tested yet, have they? No, I will not gift an untested sword! If just one sword is faulty, this gift could be taken as a treacherous act against the Longbeards. The Longbeard captains will be arriving very soon. Quickly, you must find some Orcs and test out these weapons!'
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nYou should give the Zhélruka weapons to the visiting Longbeard captains.
'I have given it some thought.'
